name: Table Bandit
description:
Table Bandit is a 3-dimensional stealth game where you play as a dog who is trying to steal food from various places. The specific goal is to steal and gather these scattered food items throughout each level. You will run into enemies such as humans, both stationary and moving. You must avoid getting caught by humans in order to win. 

Each level will get more difficult and more creativity will be required to make your way around to gather all the food items.
